message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to extend an offer to purchase this product from me at a special price of $1200000. This offer is designed to provide you with an exceptional value while ensuring a fair return for my investment in acquiring and preparing this item for you. I believe this price reflects the quality, rarity, and significance of the product, making it an attractive proposition for both parties. I look forward to your thoughtful consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
